function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of pandemic on labor market, supply of materials, and supply of equipment","Impact":"Negatively impacted project delivery, supply chain disruptions, and funding restrictions","Mitigation":"Improve supply chain management, secure alternate sources of materials, and invest in advanced equipment","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, advanced manufacturing technologies","People":"Labor market, supply chain managers, project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, supply chain management teams"},{"Description":"Unanticipated project delays due to lockdowns and governmental orders","Impact":"Reduced crew size with social distancing and delayed project completions","Mitigation":"Develop flexible project schedules, implement remote work strategies, and provide additional resources for completion","Technologies":"Project management tools, remote collaboration platforms","People":"Project managers, site supervisors, construction workers","Owner":"Construction companies, project management teams"},{"Description":"Increase in uncertainties and disruptions in mega projects","Impact":"Financial and productivity challenges due to lack of overhead costs, delayed payments, and material and labor shortages","Mitigation":"Invest in contingency planning, negotiate flexible payment terms, and diversify labor sources","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, financial management software","People":"Project managers, finance teams, labor contractors","Owner":"Construction companies, finance departments"}]}
